alert.note: Alert for Southern Baltimore (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 17 at 8:41AM EDT until June 17 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level in low lying areas due to tidal flooding. * WHERE...Shoreline in Southern Baltimore County and the city of Baltimore. * WHEN...Until 11 AM EDT this morning, especially around the time of high tide. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tides one to one and a half feet above normal. The next high tide at Fort McHenry Baltimore is at 9:43 AM. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Chesapeake Bay at Bowleys Quarters MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 3.8 ft, Major 5.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.1 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 AM 2.9 1.2 0.9 1.0 None 17/11 PM 1.4 -0.3 0.3 1.0 None 18/10 AM 1.5 -0.2 -0.2 1.0 None 19/12 AM 0.5 -1.2 -0.7 1.0 None 19/12 PM 1.2 -0.5 -0.5 1.0 None 20/01 AM 0.9 -0.8 -0.4 1.0 None NW Branch Patapsco River at Baltimore MD MLLW Categories - Minor 3.0 ft, Moderate 5.0 ft, Major 6.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 3.3 ft, Major 4.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 17/10 AM 2.9 1.2 0.8 1.0 None 17/10 PM 1.7 0.0 0.4 1.0 None 18/10 AM 1.8 0.1 -0.1 1.0 None 18/11 PM 0.8 -0.9 -0.6 1.0 None 19/11 AM 1.5 -0.2 -0.3 1.0 None 20/12 AM 1.2 -0.5 -0.3 0.5 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
